Uses of Class
com.meetwise.fs.FileSystemException

Packages that use FileSystemException
com.meetwise.fs Contains the file-system independent classes and interfaces, as well as the FileSystemFactory for creating FileSystem instances. 
com.meetwise.fs.fat Contains the classes implementing the FAT(12/16/32) file system. 
 

Uses of FileSystemException in com.meetwise.fs
 

Subclasses of FileSystemException in com.meetwise.fs
 class FileSystemFullException
          Gets thrown when a file system can not store the additional data that is tried to be written.
 class ReadOnlyFileSystemException
          Exception allowing to handle cases where a FileSystem is mounted readOnly.

Subclasses of FileSystemException in com.meetwise.fs.fat
 class RootDirectoryFullException
          Gets thrown when the root directory of a FAT12/FAT16 file system becomes full and can not hold the additional entry.
